tooltip.celestial_equipments.abyss_whisp: Deals an additional %s Abyss Damage after attacking
tooltip.celestial_equipments.crystal_lon: Briefly increases Critical Rate and Critical Damage after attacking
tooltip.celestial_equipments.giant_skele: Attacks deal an additional %s damage to the target's maximum health
tooltip.celestial_equipments.undead_swor: Increases damage by %s when attacking undead mobs.
